item.title: 5 Stephen King Books That Deserve Anthologies After The Stand
item.description: The Stand is getting expanded on in a 2025 anthology, and there are several other Stephen King books that could benefit from this approach.

item.title: "I've Grown Up With Marvel": Sebastian Stan Reflects On His 15 Years In The MCU And How Special The Bucky Barnes Character Is To Him
item.description: Sebastian Stan praises the MCU for making him a household name as the Winter Soldier, which allowed him to take chances with his acting career.

item.title: I Can’t Believe The Venom Movie Series Was Over 5 Times More Successful At The Box Office Than All The Franchise’s Other Films Put Together
item.description: It's fair to say that Venom carried Sony's Spider-Man Universe, but the extent of its success compared to other movies in the franchise is dizzying.
